>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/admin/oauth/active-sessions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns all non-revoked, non-expired refresh tokens for a user,
joined with client names for display.
